nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 2: Jedi Master Class
LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 2: Jedi Master Class is a forthcoming young readers book written by Ace Landers.

Three all-new LEGO(R) Star Wars(TM) strories with full-color illustrations, perfect for reluctant readers. In these hilarious, original stories, join Luke, Rey, and Anakin as they get schooled by Jedi Masters! From C-3PO getting mistaken for a bounty hunter named Dengar (and hunted by Obi-Wan and Anakin), to Rey's misadventures with Chewie while training on Ach-To, to a pod-racing match-up between Darth Vader and Luke, this chapter book has it all!
